verbose_text: Meanwhile, the investigation for SDC prognosis in the minor salivary glands may be insufficient.21 HER2 has been reported to be positive in approximately 40% of SDC,22, 23 and the overexpression of HER2 and tumor protein p53 is likely associated with the poor clinical course of SDC.20 Regardless of the histological subtype of the malignant component, evaluation of invasion is one of the most important prognostic criteria.
